item.title: How can I get everything like the official runescape?!
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:18, topic:19050”]Jeez, you need to look at the client more. The server simply has to write bytes to the socket that the client knows what to do with. That part is easy. Getting the client to do exactly what you want is the hard part though.

~ It’s all in the client! ~[/quote]

Mmmmk, who are you talking to here :P?

Read full topic
item.source: How can I get everything like the official runescape?!

item.title: How can I get everything like the official runescape?!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Jeez, you need to look at the client more. The server simply has to write bytes to the socket that the client knows what to do with. That part is easy. Getting the client to do exactly what you want is the hard part though.

~ It’s all in the client! ~

Read full topic
item.source: How can I get everything like the official runescape?!

item.title: How can I get everything like the official runescape?!
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

you just can't "make" your private server better than normal rs,

That depends on your definition of how shitty real Runescape is :P.

you need lots of practice, help from others, (maybe) years of experience, dependence on your time what you spend with it, if you are nerd and in computer 10 hours/day you may CAN learn java faster than people with life... But this is just my opinion..

The only thing you really need to start working on developing a Runescape private server is a text editor and a basic knowledge of java. I recommend just playing with the code and seeing what happens. If you have hyrbidscape it’s easy to see the NPC lists etc…it’s very noob friendly.

but like the guy posted...if we knew what the real rs stuff was like...then we could edit and make better

Yeah, the Runescape source code would be great. But you have more than you think, if you know how to access it, the cache has all the game data, so you can load sounds, textures, 3D models, whatever.

Read full topic

item.title: How can I get everything like the official runescape?!
item.dc:creator: @ikick221 ikick221
item.description:
@ikick221 wrote:

ok. if you want an item type in:

::pickup (item code here)

That will pick up the item. The List of codes can be found under Item Id’s in the help menu.

item.title: How can I get everything like the official runescape?!
item.dc:creator: @Jei_Jei_KK Jei Jei KK
item.description:
@Jei_Jei_KK wrote:

[quote=“live4eva, post:6, topic:19050”][quote author=XxXtidusXxX link=topic=28920.msg335888#msg335888 date=1161429724]
ok ur gay if u want it to be like real runescape
[/quote]

Your right cause you can make your private sever better then normal runescape[/quote]

Thats not noob-friendly Of course you can say what you think, but think before you say, i dont think you were professional when you first got to see private servers… I mean, i’ve been doing things with SCAR for about year, but still, im not very good in scripting… you just can’t “make” your private server better than normal rs, you need lots of practice, help from others, (maybe) years of experience, dependence on your time what you spend with it, if you are nerd and in computer 10 hours/day you may CAN learn java faster than people with life… But this is just my opinion…

However, i can’t answer to dobbleblade’s question, i really CAN’T script java, i made only text appear in CMD window; “JAGEX IS n00b!”

Nobody’s perfect, not even you XxXtidusXxX, and you are never not going to be perfect, if you just call all noobs “gay”

Read full topic
